headline: Evercore Reiterates Sell on Franklin Resources (BEN) Amid Mixed Ratings
summary: Franklin Resources, Inc. (NYSE:BEN) is one of the 12 Dividend Stocks With High Insider Buying. The company saw mixed analyst sentiment on February 5, 2025. Evercore ISI analyst Glenn Schorr, on February 5, 2026, reiterated a Sell rating on Franklin Resources, Inc. (NYSE:BEN), with a price target of $28. Conversely, on the same day, TD […]
